title: Pay-Smart
description: Pay-Smart is a debt settlement tool designed to simplify group financial management. By modeling debts as a graph, it minimizes transactions required to settle obligations among members. Built using C++ with Data Structures and Algorithm

title: NextSpark
description: NextSpark is a web application designed to assist job and internship seekers by providing a centralized platform for off-campus application links. Built using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB
